results.p: The fastest browser on Earth. Thorium Bubbles Chromium fork for Linux, Windows, MacOS, Android, and Raspberry Pi named after radioactive element No. 90.

results.t: Thorium: The Fastest Open Source Chromium-based Browser?
results.p: Enable Parallel Downloading by Default. Inclusion of pak a utility for packing and unpacking the *.pak files in Thorium or any other Chromium based browser.
